name: merongmix2
description:
Merongmix2 is based on SD1.x(not 2)

NSFW and SFW both available

I have mixed the merongmix++ with some loras and some models.

The art style looks like mixing of merongstelmix and merongmix. (or not?)

I highly recommend using

  • highres.fix(or generation with high-resolution)

    • I usually upscale 640*960 to 1024*1536(or higher)

  • higher sampling step >40 (low sampling step for the second pass is OK)

  • Negative prompts "(low quality, worst quality:1.4)" or your negative prompt

  • VAE: kl-f8-anime2.vae.pt, 840000-ema-pruned.vae.pt and anything-v4.0.vae.pt

    • Up to your decision

Also, you can find other models:

  • merongmix+ | Stable Diffusion Checkpoint | Civitai

  • merongmix++ | Stable Diffusion Checkpoint | Civitai

  • MerongstelMix - Merongsteline | Stable Diffusion Checkpoint | Civitai

And my ai artwork:

  • cinoai User Profile | DeviantArt

  • 下手て - pixiv

  • cinoaiAIART (@cinoaiaiai) / Twitter

  • 아멜리아최고 - Twitch
